#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <cassert>
int main() {
    std::vector<int> vec;
    vec.push_back(0);
    int & r = vec[0];
    if (r == 0) {
        r = 1;
        vec.push_back(0);
    }
    assert(r > 0);
    return 0;
}
